BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.delay#
BlackBox.type:
delay#
  :: Clock domain gated       -- ARG[0]
  -> a                        -- ARG[1]
  -> Signal clk a             -- ARG[2]
  -> Signal clk a

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.register#
BlackBox.type:
register#
  :: Clock domain gated       -- ARG[0]
  -> Reset domain synchronous -- ARG[1]
  -> a                        -- ARG[2] (powerup value)
  -> a                        -- ARG[3] (reset value)
  -> Signal clk a             -- ARG[4]
  -> Signal clk a
BlackBox.template:
-- register begin~IF ~ISGATED[0] ~THEN
~GENSYM[~COMPNAME_register][0] : block
  signal ~GENSYM[clk][1] : std_logic;
  signal ~GENSYM[ce][2] : boolean;
  signal ~GENSYM[~RESULT_reg][3] : ~TYPO := ~CONST[2];
begin
  (~SYM[1],~SYM[2]) <= ~ARG[0];
  ~RESULT <= ~SYM[3]; ~IF ~ISSYNC[1] ~THEN
  ~GENSYM[~RESULT_r][4] : process(~SYM[1])
  begin
    if rising_edge(~SYM[1]) then
      if ~ARG[1] = '1' then
        ~SYM[3] <= ~CONST[3]
        -- pragma translate_off
        after 1 ps
        -- pragma translate_on
        ;
      elsif ~SYM[2] then
        ~SYM[3] <= ~ARG[4]
        -- pragma translate_off
        after 1 ps
        -- pragma translate_on
        ;
      end if;
    end if;
  end process;~ELSE
  ~SYM[4] : process(~SYM[1],~ARG[1])
  begin
    if ~ARG[1] = '1' then
      ~SYM[3] <= ~CONST[3];
    elsif rising_edge(~SYM[1]) then
      if ~SYM[2] then
        ~SYM[3] <= ~ARG[4]
        -- pragma translate_off
        after 1 ps
        -- pragma translate_on
        ;
      end if;
    end if;
  end process;~FI
end block;~ELSE
~SYM[0] : block
  signal ~SYM[3] : ~TYPO := ~CONST[2];
begin
  ~RESULT <= ~SYM[3]; ~IF ~ISSYNC[1] ~THEN
  ~SYM[4] : process(~ARG[0])
  begin
    if rising_edge(~ARG[0]) then
      if ~ARG[1] = '1' then
        ~SYM[3] <= ~CONST[3]
        -- pragma translate_off
        after 1 ps
        -- pragma translate_on
        ;
      else
        ~SYM[3] <= ~ARG[4]
        -- pragma translate_off
        after 1 ps
        -- pragma translate_on
        ;
      end if;
    end if;
  end process;~ELSE
  ~SYM[4] : process(~ARG[0],~ARG[1])
  begin
    if ~ARG[1] = '1' then
      ~SYM[3] <= ~CONST[3]
      -- pragma translate_off
      after 1 ps
      -- pragma translate_on
      ;
    elsif rising_edge(~ARG[0]) then
      ~SYM[3] <= ~ARG[4]
      -- pragma translate_off
      after 1 ps
      -- pragma translate_on
      ;
    end if;
  end process;~FI
end block;~FI
-- register end

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.clockGate
BlackBox.type:
clockGate
  :: Clock domain gated -- ARG[0]
  -> Signal domain Bool -- ARG[1]
  -> Clock domain 'Gated

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.clockGen
BlackBox.type:
clockGen
  :: (domain ~ Dom nm period -- ARG[0]
     ,KnownSymbol nm         -- ARG[1]
     ,KnownNat period)       -- ARG[2]
  => Clock domain Source

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.tbClockGen
BlackBox.type:
tbClockGen
  :: (domain ~ Dom nm period -- ARG[0]
     ,KnownSymbol nm         -- ARG[1]
     ,KnownNat period)       -- ARG[2]
  => Signal domain Bool      -- ARG[3]
  -> Clock domain Source

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.asyncResetGen
BlackBox.template:
-- pragma translate_off
~RESULT <= '1',
           '0' after 3001 ps;
-- pragma translate_on

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.syncResetGen
BlackBox.type:
syncResetGen :: ( domain ~ 'Dom n clkPeriod
                 , KnownNat clkPeriod )
              => Reset domain 'Synchronous
BlackBox.template:
-- pragma translate_off
~RESULT <= '1',
           '0' after (2999 ps + ~LIT[1]0 ps);
-- pragma translate_on

BlackBox.type: unsafeFromAsyncReset :: Reset domain Asynchronous -> Signal domain Bool

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.unsafeToAsyncReset
BlackBox.type: unsafeToAsyncReset :: Signal domain Bool -> Reset domain Asynchronous

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.fromSyncReset
BlackBox.type: fromSyncReset :: Reset domain Synchronous -> Signal domain Bool

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.unsafeToSyncReset
BlackBox.type: unsafeToSyncReset :: Signal domain Bool -> Reset domain Synchronous
